title: The Millionaire's Secret Wish
description: Handsome Dylan Barrows made having amnesia much easier for Alisa Jennings! She remembered very little about herself, but the sexy executive made her feel whole again. Dylan said they were just friends, but instinct told her that wasn't the full story... Dylan's one wish was to win ex-flame Alisa's love back, and now he saw his chance. He'd broken her heart in the past and was determined to make amends. Yet when Alisa's memory returned, with past and future colliding, would his heart survive?
author: Leanne Banks
